doc.previous: Solving differential equations is not like solving algebraic equations Not only are their solutions oftentimes unclear but whether solutions are unique or exist at all are also notable subjects of interest
doc.after: However this only helps us with first order initial value problems Suppose we had a linear initial value problem of the nth order
